member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.Windows.Controls.Editors.Interop.Grids.PropertyEditors.BrushPropertyEditor.HasSwatch
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the edit box should display a swatch that previews the Value.
member.value: true if the edit box should display a swatch that previews the Value; otherwise, false. The default value is true.

member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.Windows.Controls.Editors.Interop.Grids.PropertyEditors.BrushPropertyEditor.IsAlphaEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the alpha channel (transparency) of the brush value colors are enabled.
member.value: true if the alpha channel (transparency) of the brush value colors are enabled; otherwise, false. The default value is true.
member.remarks: When disabled, no transparency is supported.

member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.Windows.Controls.Editors.Interop.Grids.PropertyEditors.BrushPropertyEditor.IsGradientAllowed
member.summary: Gets or sets whether gradient brush values can be entered.
member.value: true if gradient brush values can be entered; otherwise, false. The default value is true.

member.summary: Gets the resource key that references a pre-defined within internal resources to use for editing the property value.
member.value: The resource key that references a pre-defined within internal resources to use for editing the property value.

member.summary: Represents a for editing a masked String value with a .
member.remarks: This property editor is not automatically installed by the since it requires a specific to be set to the scenario in which it is used. Set a and also the PropertyName (or also ObjectType and PropertyType properties as needed) of the property to target with this property editor.

member.summary: Initializes an instance of the class.

member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.Windows.Controls.Editors.Interop.Grids.PropertyEditors.MaskedStringPropertyEditor.IsCaseAutoCorrected
member.summary: Gets or sets whether characters entered will have their case auto-corrected to match the defined mask.
member.value: true if characters entered will have their case auto-corrected to match the defined mask; otherwise, false. The default value is false.
member.remarks: When this property is set to true, then the property is ignored.

member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.Windows.Controls.Editors.Interop.Grids.PropertyEditors.MaskedStringPropertyEditor.IsCaseSensitive
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the mask is case sensitive.
member.value: true if the mask is case sensitive; otherwise, false. The default value is false.
member.remarks: When the property is set to true, this property is ignored.

member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.Windows.Controls.Editors.Interop.Grids.PropertyEditors.MaskedStringPropertyEditor.Mask
member.summary: Gets or sets the text that designates the input mask.
member.value: The text that designates the input mask. The default value is .

member.summary: Gets or sets the kind of input mask.
member.value: The kind of input mask. The default value is Regex.

member.name: M:ActiproSoftware.Windows.Controls.Editors.Interop.Grids.PropertyEditors.Primitives.PropertyEditorBase.CreateValueTemplate
member.summary: Creates the to use for editing the property value.
member.returns: The to use for editing the property value.

member.name: M:ActiproSoftware.Windows.Controls.Editors.Interop.Grids.PropertyEditors.Primitives.PropertyEditorBase.#ctor(System.Type)
member.summary: Initializes an instance of the PropertyEditorBase class.

member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.Windows.Controls.Editors.Interop.Grids.PropertyEditors.Primitives.PropertyEditorBase.PredefinedValueTemplateKey
member.summary: Gets the resource key that references a pre-defined within internal resources to use for editing the property value.
member.value: The resource key that references a pre-defined within internal resources to use for editing the property value.

member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.Windows.Controls.Editors.Interop.Grids.PropertyEditors.Primitives.PropertyEditorBase.ValueTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the to use for editing the property value.
member.value: The to use for editing the property value.

member.name: T:ActiproSoftware.Windows.Controls.Editors.Interop.Grids.PropertyEditors.Primitives.PartEditBoxPropertyEditorBase
member.summary: Represents the abstract base class for a that uses a part edit box.

member.name: M:ActiproSoftware.Windows.Controls.Editors.Interop.Grids.PropertyEditors.Primitives.PartEditBoxPropertyEditorBase.#ctor(System.Type)
member.summary: Initializes an instance of the PartEditBoxPropertyEditorBase class.

member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.Windows.Controls.Editors.Interop.Grids.PropertyEditors.Primitives.PartEditBoxPropertyEditorBase.CommitTriggers
member.summary: Gets or sets the triggers that will force this control to commit any changes.
member.value: A indicating the triggers that will force this control to commit any changes. The default value is PartEditBoxCommitTriggers.Default.

member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.Windows.Controls.Editors.Interop.Grids.PropertyEditors.Primitives.PartEditBoxPropertyEditorBase.HasPopup
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control has a popup available.
member.value: true if the control has a popup available; otherwise false. The default value is true.

member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.Windows.Controls.Editors.Interop.Grids.PropertyEditors.Primitives.PartEditBoxPropertyEditorBase.IsArrowKeyPartNavigationEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the left/right arrow keys can be used to move between and select editable parts.
member.value: true if the left/right arrow keys can be used to move between and select editable parts; otherwise false. The default value is true.

member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.Windows.Controls.Editors.Interop.Grids.PropertyEditors.Primitives.PartEditBoxPropertyEditorBase.IsEditable
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the edit box's text area is editable.
member.value: true if the edit box's text area is editable; otherwise false. The default value is true.
member.remarks: When false, the edit box behaves more like a ComboBox.

member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.Windows.Controls.Editors.Interop.Grids.PropertyEditors.Primitives.PartEditBoxPropertyEditorBase.IsNullAllowed
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether null values are allowed to be entered by the user.
member.value: true if null values are allowed to be entered by the user; otherwise false. The default value is false.

member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.Windows.Controls.Editors.Interop.Grids.PropertyEditors.Primitives.PartEditBoxPropertyEditorBase.PlaceholderText
member.summary: Gets or sets the text that is displayed in the control until the value is changed by a user action or some other operation.
member.value: The text that is displayed in the control until the value is changed by a user action or some other operation.

member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.Windows.Controls.Editors.Interop.Grids.PropertyEditors.Primitives.PartEditBoxPropertyEditorBase.SpinnerVisibility
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating if and when the control has a spinner available.
member.value: A value indicating if and when the control has a spinner available. The default value is SpinnerVisibility.Collapsed.

member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.Windows.Controls.Editors.Interop.Grids.PropertyEditors.Primitives.PartEditBoxPropertyEditorBase.SpinWrapping
member.summary: Gets or sets the wrapping behavior used when spinning past a minimum or maximum value in the active part.
member.value: The wrapping behavior used when spinning past a minimum or maximum value in the active part. The default value is SpinWrapping.NoWrap.

member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.Windows.Controls.Editors.Interop.Grids.PropertyEditors.Primitives.PartEditBoxPropertyEditorBase.TextAlignment
member.summary: Gets or sets the text alignment of the text editing area.
member.value: The text alignment of the text editing area. The default value is TextAlignment.Left.
